Our app was created to provide accurate and up-to-date information about COVID-19. In these challenging times, when information changes rapidly, we believe that access to reliable data is critically important.
Our main goal is to provide easy access to the latest statistical data on COVID-19, including case numbers, vaccinations, and trends. We strive to help users make informed decisions by providing them with current information and analytics.
We use data from Google Open Data and analyze it using Google BigQuery to ensure the accuracy and reliability of our information. All data is regularly updated to ensure the timeliness of the information for our users.
For questions, suggestions, or comments, please contact us at the email address dianaolar4@gmail.com
